title: SWOT Analysis
subtitle: Men's Skincare & Haircare Market - Tunisia
strengths: Increasing consumer awareness and acceptance of men's grooming
Growing disposable income and urbanization trends
Strong social media penetration (56.9% of population)
Cultural shift toward personal grooming acceptance
weaknesses: Cultural and traditional masculinity norms in certain segments
opportunities: Rising demand for natural and organic products
E-commerce growth potential (currently only 5.2% of market)
threats: Intense competition from established international brands
Supply chain challenges for imported ingredients
